header.tagline: Mobile app and web development agency

items.title: CoSafe
items.description: A digital safety solution that helps organizations improve employee safety, communication, and emergency response. It centralizes safety processes, reports, and incidents in real time to reduce risk and build trust.

items.title: Senior Group
items.description: An internal system for senior care homes to manage client and staff records and daily care processes. It makes it easy to log visits, generate reports, and centralize information to boost efficiency and care quality.

items.title: 1Touch Business
items.description: A mobile app for specialists to manage services, clients, and bookings in one place, with calendar planning. It automates payments, invoices, and reports to control cash flow and run daily work efficiently.

items.title: AppointUs Web
items.description: A website that clearly presents company services and products to strengthen brand trust online. It helps customers quickly find information, see the value, and easily reach out or take next steps.

items.title: 1Touch Client
items.description: A client mobile app to find specialists, book services, and manage visits in one place. It keeps bookings, payments, and communication clear for simple, transparent service delivery.

items.title: 1Touch Client Web
items.description: A client web app to find specialists, book services, and manage visits from any device. It keeps bookings, payments, and communication transparent for reliable service delivery.

items.title: AppointUs Admin
items.description: An employee admin PWA optimized for phones. Staff manage schedules, tasks, and client info, tracking visits and reports in real time.

items.title: Graviti
items.description: A mobile app for booking shipping containers, letting customers reserve, track status, and manage bookings. Admins centrally control data, availability, billing, and reporting for efficient logistics.

items.title: AppointUs Client
items.description: A client web app to find specialists, book services, and manage visits from any device. It keeps bookings, payments, and communication transparent for reliable service delivery.

hero.title: Digital products that turn ideas into reality

about.title: Who we are and how we help businesses
about.lead: MobWebTech is a mobile and web development studio that blends strategy and engineering to build products with strong market impact.
about.body: We connect business goals with modern technology: concepts, prototypes, MVPs, and production releases with maintenance and data security included.
about.capabilitiesTitle: Engineering-first delivery with measurable checkpoints every sprint.
about.capabilitiesBody: We focus on reliability, observability, and readiness to hand the product over to your customers.

items.title: Mobile app development
items.description: We build convenient, fast mobile apps for iPhone and Android that reach customers on their phones, run reliably, and are ready to grow.

items.title: Web platforms
items.description: We craft modern websites, portals, and admin panels that strengthen your brand, are safe to use, and accessible on any device.

items.title: SaaS products
items.description: We build subscription-based digital products that generate recurring revenue, simplify customer management, and let your business scale without technical blockers.

items.title: Design systems
items.description: We create a unified design approach that makes your digital solutions recognizable, easy to maintain, and faster to extend with new features.

items.title: Internal systems
items.description: We automate internal processes with tailored tools that cut manual work, prevent errors, and give leadership a clear overview of operations.

items.title: Technical consulting
items.description: We provide clear technical guidance to make informed decisions, improve performance, and lower long-term costs.
